item.title: Edward add a quote by Malcolm Forbes
item.description: "The true measure of a man is how he treats someone who can do him absolutely no good." -- Malcolm Forbes

item.title: Edward add a quote by Michelangelo Buonarroti
item.description: "The greater danger for most of us lies not in setting our aim too high and falling short; but in setting our aim too low, and achieving our mark." -- Michelangelo Buonarroti

item.title: Edward add a quote by Alfred Lord Tennyson
item.description: "Though much is taken, much abides; and though We are not now that strength which in old days Moved earth and heaven, that which we are, we are; One equal temper of heroic hearts, Made weak by time and fate, but strong in will To strive, to seek, to find, and not to yield." -- Alfred Lord Tennyson

item.title: Edward add a quote by Austin Phelps
item.description: "Wear the old coat and buy the new book." -- Austin Phelps
